trans-unit.source: Stores an ordered pair of integers, which specify a <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height*> and <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width*>.
trans-unit.target: 儲存指定的整數的排序的配對<> *> 和<> *>。

trans-unit.source: The Size class is used to specify a height and width through the <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Size%2A> property for <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>, <xref:System.Drawing.RectangleF>, <xref:System.Drawing.Image>, <xref:System.Drawing.Icon> and other graphics classes.
trans-unit.target: 大小類別用來指定高度和寬度透過<xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Size%2A>屬性<xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>， <xref:System.Drawing.RectangleF>， <xref:System.Drawing.Image>，<xref:System.Drawing.Icon>和其他圖形 」 類別。</xref:System.Drawing.Icon> </xref:System.Drawing.Image> </xref:System.Drawing.RectangleF> </xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle> </xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Size%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can perform operations on a Size by using the overloaded operators such as <xref:System.Drawing.Size.op_Addition%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Size.op_Subtraction%2A>, and <xref:System.Drawing.Size.op_Equality%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 您可以執行在大小上的作業使用多載的運算子，像是<xref:System.Drawing.Size.op_Addition%2A>， <xref:System.Drawing.Size.op_Subtraction%2A>，和<xref:System.Drawing.Size.op_Equality%2A>。</xref:System.Drawing.Size.op_Equality%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Size.op_Subtraction%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Size.op_Addition%2A>

trans-unit.source: The unit for the <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A> of the Size structure depend on the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageUnit%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageScale%2A> settings for the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object that is used to draw.
trans-unit.target: 單位<xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A>和<xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A>大小的結構取決於<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageUnit%2A>和<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageScale%2A>設定<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>用來繪製的物件。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageScale%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageUnit%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A>

trans-unit.source: Returns a hash code for this <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: 傳回這個雜湊程式碼<xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref>結構。

trans-unit.source: You should avoid depending on GetHashCode for unique values, as two <xref:System.Drawing.Size> objects with the same values for their <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A> properties may return the same hash code.
trans-unit.target: 您應該避免根據 GetHashCode 唯一值，做為兩個<xref:System.Drawing.Size>具有相同值的物件及其<xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A>和<xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A>屬性可能會傳回相同的雜湊碼。</xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Size>

trans-unit.source: This behavior could change in a future release.
trans-unit.target: 這種行為可能在未來版本中變更。

trans-unit.source: An integer value that specifies a hash value for this <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: 整數值，指定這個雜湊值<xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref>結構。
